summary: This is a brief email or note dated September 2, 2021, referencing that a firm received texts from individuals on July 6, 2019 (the day of Jeffrey Epstein's arrest), but no substantive witness information was conveyed.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest
events.description: The document references the day of Jeffrey Epstein's arrest, noting that a firm received texts from individuals but no substantive witness information was conveyed.

keyFacts: The document is dated September 2, 2021, but references events from July 6, 2019.
July 6, 2019, is identified as the day of Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.
A firm received texts from individuals on that date, but no substantive witness information was conveyed in those texts.
